response.job_title: Solutions Leader | Product Owner | Open Networks
response.summary:
Software Product Owner/Lead with expertise in Telecommunications/IT industry. Experience with developing multidisciplinary groups for product evolution, from the business/functional team, UX/UI team, technical team (architecture, backend, frontend), QA Team in an Agile framework. Passionate about leading and encouraging people to success.

Strong skills in complex business understanding and assimilation, pain points and priorities identification, backlog and product roadmap management. Communication is key in my role; listening, learning and take informed decisions. Experience in communications with stakeholders and big clients worldwide, mainly mean network operators.
response.skills: Bash, Telecomunicaciones, Analytics, Machine Learning, Scrum, Extraer, transformar, cargar (ETL), Análisis de datos, Experiencia del cliente, Python, Bases de datos, SQL, Tableau, Liderazgo de equipos, NiFi, Talend Open Studio, Servicios de telecomunicaciones, Expert choice, Estadística

profile_positions.description:
Product Manager and Product Owner for open solutions from NTT Data's Open Networks Center of Excellence. Solutions manager in collaboration with TIP (Telecom Infra Project) community, focused on meeting the needs of network inventory management, workforce, network assurance, fulfillment and automation process for Telecom. 

Product team leader focused on the end to end of the solution using Scrum methodologies: Survey and definition of user stories, UI/UX design, backend/frontend architecture and development, testing (RPA/QA), delivery and support. Product integration for mobile and fixed networks in Latam, Europe and Asia.
profile_positions.title: Solutions Lead

profile_positions.description: Definition and implementation of Inventory and Workforce Management for a rural mobile network operator in Perú. Collaboration manager with Meta for the implementation of Open Source tools focused on solutions for OSS (Operational Support Systems) in the Telecom sector.
profile_positions.title: Solutions Specialist

profile_positions.description: Execution of innovation projects for Telecommunications Mean Networks Operators. Administration of systems oriented in Customer Experience for Telecom. Data ingestion and enrichment processes for BI oriented to use cases for improving user experience on the network. Use of NiFi, SQL, Talend focused on business needs.
profile_positions.title: Solutions Analyst

profile_positions.description: Monitoring of network security systems for different types of clients. Analysis and reaction to security incidents.
profile_positions.title: Analista de seguridad de información

profile_positions.description: Research engineer in exchange in University of Wisconsin Milwaukee. Hardware in the Loop simulation project focused on the analysis of information associated with communications in electrical installations, mainly power microgrids.
profile_positions.title: Ingeniero de investigación

company.name: NTT DATA Europe & Latam
company.description:
NTT DATA – a part of NTT Group - is a top 10 global IT services provider, headquartered in Tokyo, with over 150,000 employees. 

We help clients transform through consulting, industry solutions, business process services, IT modernization and managed services. 

NTT DATA enables clients, as well as society, to move confidently into the digital future. We are committed to our clients' long-term success and combine global reach with local client attention to serve them in over 50 countries.
